body_html: @jbarker-nvidia @soumith Hi! I would like to ask if there would a legit wrap for im2col and col2im? I can live with using unfold as a substitute of im2col but what about col2im? I also see szagoruyko wrapping in #419 but he doesn't seemed to have made a pull request, plus I think it doesn't support autograd.
body_text: @jbarker-nvidia @soumith Hi! I would like to ask if there would a legit wrap for im2col and col2im? I can live with using unfold as a substitute of im2col but what about col2im? I also see szagoruyko wrapping in #419 but he doesn't seemed to have made a pull request, plus I think it doesn't support autograd.
body: @jbarker-nvidia @soumith Hi! I would like to ask if there would a legit wrap for ```im2col``` and ```col2im```? I can live with using ```unfold``` as a substitute of ```im2col``` but what about ```col2im```? I also see szagoruyko wrapping in #419 but he doesn't seemed to have made a pull request, plus I think it doesn't support autograd.
